modules.title: Module 1: Assembly Language for AI
modules.description: Understanding machine instructions and memory models.
tasks: Write a simple 'hello world' program in x86 assembly.
Implement a basic arithmetic function using only assembly instructions.

modules.title: Module 2: Compiler Theory
modules.description: Building a mini-compiler to understand code translation.
tasks: Create a lexer for a simple language.
Implement a parser that builds an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST).
